title: I looked at Kat's proposed new kit

embed.description: Tonight's red post collection includes ricklessabandon with a tentative set of Katarina changes that will be hitting the PBE soon, with information on a upcoming summoner icon for players who do not dodge a game of Nemesis Draft, a look at Blood Moon Elise's concept art, and more!

body:
And...how am I supposed to build her now?

Here's the thing: I have been playing LoL since 2009 and Katarina's been my favorite champion for all but like a month of that. I get it, she's bad for the game with her current kit. If she isn't absolutely terrible she is way, way too good. The AOE resets off of one targeted, near instant combo make her unhealthy.

But this? How am I supposed to build her? AD bruiser with Triforce? Her AP burst got cut to ribbons here, and if I want to make use of that autoattack and AD scaling I have to build double pen.

Maybe I'm missing something that Riot sees in it, but to me it looks like they've just produced a really unfocused kit, and I would really like to know what they're thinking with all this.

replies.body: Unless they change the damage type of her abilities, she is going to a worse Eve
You are suppose to roll an AD champ, ADC mid if possible.
Wait for Scarra to figure it out and watch what he does.
Looks like that's gonna be the thing to do after this. Kinda makes me sad. There had to have been a better way to rework her.
